GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
erofs: wake up all waiters after z_erofs_lzma_head ready

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 96aa2a6a89618d850ef082e4268007e840c28769, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 622ceaddb7649ca328832f50ba1400af778d75fa. For more details please see the references link.
